short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feel the wild energy of Inosuke Hashibira with a striking blue theme, swords drawn, and shattering fragments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Channel the wild energy of Inosuke Hashibira in a striking blue theme with dynamic swordplay!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A vibrant interface featuring Inosuke wielding his dual swords, surrounded by flying fragments and an intense blue glow.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay sharp with a sleek display that matches Inosuke’s untamed yet focused spirit.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Demon Slayer-inspired mini-games straight from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Elevate your browsing experience with features as bold and dynamic as Inosuke himself.
